name: Finger Jets
description: Finger Jets: Phase Challenge is a 2D Arcade physics game where you control the Jets of your Spaceship with your Finger tips as you Challenge 3 phases with 6 levels each. High scores for challenge Time Attack are tracked on the leaderboards.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
